allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Gatling-Web performance testing platform

Full-stack application for Gatling load test management:
- Backend: Spring Boot 3.2, Java 20, SQLite, WebSocket STOMP
- Frontend: React 19, TypeScript, Vite, Monaco Editor, Recharts
- Workspace: Standalone Gatling 3.10.5 project with Maven plugin

Features: test execution with queue, real-time metrics, infrastructure
monitoring, threshold profiles, trend analysis, test comparison, PDF export,
simulation editor with templates, Gatling recorder integration.

Includes Priority 1 improvements:
- 75 unit tests \(ThresholdService, SimulationLogParser, TestRunService,
  MetricsPersistenceService, SimulationFileService, GatlingExecutionService\)
- Graceful shutdown hooks \(@PreDestroy\) on all critical services
- Queue reliability: iterative processing, startup recovery, max queue size,
  TOCTOU race condition fix

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
